item.title: The beauty that goes behind a Mechanical watch
item.description: Mechanical watches - They are the representation of artistic ingenuity. If you are wondering what is so fascinating about mechanical watches, I welcome you to take a look at some Youtube videos that shows how a mechanical watch is manufactured. It is after knowing, understanding and appreciating the artwork that goes behind the making of a mechanical watch, I decided that I will get one for myself. I'm not a watch collector, I have never owned a time piece until I got my first mechanical watch in the spring of 2018.
